channel.title: Github on CP LOG
channel.description: Recent content in Github on CP LOG

item.title: Host your website as github.io
item.description: Introduction Pre-requisite: Have hugo installed in your environment Github account Basic linux commands Step 1: use Hugo to create a default folder for the site >>hugo new site <blog name> Then you should be able to see a structure like this in /folder . ├── archetypes ├── config.toml ├── content ├── data ├── layouts ├── static └── themes Step 2: Create two repos on github * One with the <blog name>, e.
